name: Shade - MiniJam 103
description:
This game is about a create made out of darkness.

Your aim is to steal the doughnut off of your brother!

Please be kind this game isn't that good nor is it long.

Made by DoctorLeaf and VeeDubster for MiniJam 103.

EDIT: THE TEXT AT THE START IS NOT PROPERLY CROPPED (Sorry only noticed it after I submitted the jam!)
